src:
Chiquis Rivera se transforma físicamente e impacta en las redes
La cantante Chiquis Rivera se transforma físicamente e impacta en las redes
03 Nov 2019, 20:15 by Jorge Rodarte
Chiquis Rivera, cantante de temas como Vas a volver y Esa no soy yo, se transforma físicamente e impacta en las redes sociales con su nueva imagen. Parece que la famosa Chiquis ya se prepara para la recta final del año y decide cambiar un poco su imagen.
Chiquis Rivera sorprende a sus fanáticos al colocar en Instagram una imagen en la que se le puede ver que luce diferente en su aspecto físico. Ahora luce con el pelo largo y también con su cara un poco más afilada.







Chiquis, quien se convirtió este año en esposa del también cantante Lorenzo Méndez, exvocalista de banda El Limón de don Salvador Lizárraga, como toda mujer, siempre gusta de lucir "looks" diferentes y sorprender a sus fans.
Chiquis nació en Los Ángeles, California, Estados Unidos, el 26 de junio de 1985 y aparte de cantante también es compositora, empresaria y productora.



Chiquis comenzó su carrera artística en el 2014, al dar a conocer su primer sencillo Paloma blanca. Su debut en televisión internacional lo realizó durante los Premios Juventud al presentar su segundo sencillo Esa no soy yo.
En 2018 se dio a conocer que Chiquis padece una enfermedad llamada endometriósis, lo que pondría en riesgo sus ganas de tener familia.



La cantante se puso en manos de un especialista para combatir dicha enfermedad y en distintos portales de noticias se hizo público que se encuentra entusiasmada con la idea de congelar sus óvulos, una vez que se recupere su salud.






Chiquis Rivera
text:
Chiquis Rivera physically transforms and impacts networks
Singer Chiquis Rivera physically transforms and impacts networks
03 Nov 2019, 20:15 by Jorge Rodarte
Chiquis Rivera, singer of songs like You're going back and that's not me, physically transforms and impacts social networks with his new image. It seems that the famous Chiquis is already preparing for the final stretch of the year and decides to change its image a bit.
Chiquis Rivera surprises his fans by placing on Instagram an image in which he can be seen that looks different in his physical appearance. Now he looks with long hair and also with his face a little sharper.







Chiquis, who became the wife of the singer Lorenzo Méndez this year, ex-vocalist of the band El Limón by Don Salvador Lizárraga, like every woman, always likes to wear different looks and surprise her fans.
Chiquis was born in Los Angeles, California, United States, on June 26, 1985 and apart from singer she is also a composer, businesswoman and producer.



Chiquis began his artistic career in 2014, by unveiling his first single Paloma blanca. His international television debut was made during the Youth Awards by presenting his second single That is not me.
In 2018 it was announced that Chiquis suffers from a disease called endometriosis, which would put his desire to have a family at risk.



The singer was put in the hands of a specialist to combat this disease and in different news portals it was made public that she is excited about the idea of freezing her eggs, once her health is recovered.






Chiquis Rivera
